Articles.Content:
Already did that a week after the release of 1.0.2.

The User Below me...

Is under the age of thirty (30).

Yup.

The user below me plays NoLimits or NoLimits 2.

Never heard of it.

The user below me enjoyed the 100th episode of MLP

MLP? Ew, nasty. Of course not. Pony-worship is ridiculous.

The user below me has attempted stealing an ICBM from Zimbabwe and launching it to Sealand.

Maybe...

The user below me is not me. HA! Beat that!

True.

The user below me is developing Nova's Planet Mod.

Nawp.

The user below me is not a robot.

Yup.

The user below me is currently in space (either in real life or in KSP).

Well, we're all technically in space.

Not even the user below me can say no to that.

EDIT: This is post number 6009, the first post since number 1961 in which you could turn upside down and have it look the same.

Yes.

The user below me txet esrever siht etalsnart nac.

Nope.

The user below me is a Kerbal.

Nope,

the user below me has killed more than 4 kerbals...

Yes, as I just had two slices of bacon.

Moc.esrevertxet gnisu tuohtiw txet siht esrever nac em woleb resu eht.

True

The user below me is a kraken

False.

The user below me has been a potato in a previous incarnation.

The answer starts with an "F", ends with an "E", and has an abbreviation in the middle for a disease also called Lou Gehrig's Disease.

The user below me has built an SSTO in KSP 1.0.X before.

Yes, several. Trying to SSTLaythe and back at the moment.

The user below me started playing KSP before 0.18.

Well, if you count the fact that I played 0.8.2 for a few minutes, just to look back at how far KSP had come, then yes.

The user below me is the user above me.

LIES

He's up there!

What.... If you mean what I think you mean, then yes.

TUBM has played a train simulator.
The user below me likes Jontron.

False.

The user below me drew xer own icon.

U mean avatar? not my current one.

The user below me is looking at a very expensive calculator.

Sort of, a PC counts, right?

The user below me has been sailing IRL.

True. On a catamaran

The user below me once shot a man in Reno just to watch him die.
